attributes.action: BREXIT DEADLOCK: Second Referendum for May's Deal (EU Deal) or Leave.
attributes.additional_details: I did not vote in 2016 and i have see the argument from both sides. I feel this type of referendum would give parliament a get out of jail card. This also sticks to the referendum that we already had in 2016.
attributes.background: THis is very simple and says it in the title really. The petition is to have a second referendum for May's deal (EU Deal) or the leave without a deal. This backs the vote we already had in 2016 and gives the choice back to the people if parliament can't decide.
